title: Product Analyst Intern
description: Tested and validated 50+ Awayz features across 3 release cycles, uncovering 30+ cross-platform bugs and resolving 85% of mobile responsiveness issues, which cut booking flow errors by 20% and improved customer satisfaction scores in client demos. Designed Amplitude dashboards across 10+ client environments (e.g., Monkey Miles, Executive Traveler), mapping 150+ user events and closing 40+ instrumentation gaps, enabling product teams to track funnel retention and boosting demo conversion requests by 15%. Led competitor and loyalty program analysis covering 25+ airlines and 4 rival platforms, identifying 12% more coverage gaps and highlighting one-way vs. round-trip pricing inefficiencies, insights that shaped roadmap priorities and improved B2B client win rates by 10%.
achievements: 50+ Awayz features tested across 3 release cycles
10% improvement in B2B client win rates

title: Product Management Intern
description: Partnered with engineering and design teams to integrate a Plaid CTA feature into the Rocket Mortgage Mobile App, optimizing backend processes and increasing account creation speed by 400%. Defined integration requirements for an AI-driven chatbot to streamline onboarding for the Rocket Mortgage Mobile App, reducing banker queries by 40% through seamless functionality and system compatibility. Led the design and implementation of a Rocket Homes app feature for a side-by-side house comparisons, increasing user engagement by 20% and earning the Tech Demo Award for June 2024.

title: Business Development Intern
description: Led market research and customer discovery for 10+ entrepreneurs across 15 client engagements, implementing systematic validation frameworks that improved pitch success rates by 25% during advisor reviews. Developed comprehensive business plans and financial models for startups in retail, food & beverage, and fitness sectors, delivering structured frameworks that increased client readiness for investor meetings and SBA loan applications by 40%. Built and deployed a centralized CRM system for tracking client interactions and portfolio metrics across 15+ startups, reducing strategic planning cycle time by 50% while improving data accuracy for performance analysis.
achievements: 25% improvement in client pitch success rates
40% increase in client readiness for investor meetings
50% reduction in strategic planning cycle time

title: Product Development Intern
description: Executed comprehensive market analysis using Keepa and Jungle Scout across 300+ SKUs in the sustainable wellness space, identifying 2 high-potential products that aligned with company sustainability goals and market demand trends. Collaborated directly with executive leadership to evaluate ingredient formulations and strategic positioning, delivering recommendations for 3 high-opportunity tincture products from 200+ options based on market viability and brand alignment. Developed and executed integrated digital marketing campaigns across social platforms for two eco-friendly product lines, achieving 15% engagement increase while strengthening brand positioning in the sustainable wellness market.

title: Mechanical Engineer I
description: Conducted comprehensive heat transfer analysis for Arkansas Nuclear One Plant design modification, ensuring HDPE pipe temperatures remained below 120Â°F over 10 hours, validating safety and regulatory compliance standards. Evaluated the addition of 10 electrical equipment units in a 5,000 sq. ft. Control Room, determining a <2% increase in heat load using advanced assessment techniques, ensuring system integrity and efficiency. Led a jib crane modification project, increasing cleaning process speed by 400% for strainer maintenance while ensuring compliance with ASME NOG-1 standards for nuclear crane operations.
achievements: <2% heat load increase in Control Room

title: Project Manager
description: Oversaw removal and installation of 8 critical system components at Edenwald Houses, managed 3 major NYCHA installation projects, and engineered HVAC system design enhancements for energy efficiency improvements.
